mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_num, notice_type, notice_subject, notice_content, notice_file, notice_date, notice_readcount) values (#{notice_num}, #{notice_type}, #{notice_subject}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_file}, #{notice_date}, #{notice_readcount})
mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
